page.title: 17A Day in My Life in Ingleton
page.content: After I had eaten my dinner I had 45 minutes free time before afternoon school started. It was a wet playtime so I stayed in the classroom and played with the centicubes. School started at 1.15pm and the first session was drama. We all practised our parts for assembly. We returned from the hall to our classroom at about 1.55pm and had our library session where we were able to change our library books.The afternoon break started at 2.25pm. I went out on to the playground and played catch until the whistle went at 2.40pm. Thursday afternoon after break is our games session and we played rounders until 3.45pm which was home time. I arrived home at about 4.00pm and collected my swimming costume, I went to the open air pool and stayed there until 6.00pm.
